Describe what you want built.
Manifest will convert it into a fully-functioning web app.
No code necessary. The app will be ready for users to sign up, pay for access, and experience your incredible idea come-to-life!
Set the price of your app.
Specify when & how much your users should pay to access your app.
Monthly, annually, one-time or one time payments. Specify multiple tiers for different levels of functionality.
Database, storage, payments, log in & more.

All handled for you.
No need to setup connections & integrations.
All the tricky stuff is taken care of automagically.
Subscriptions baked into every app you build.
Simply connect your Stripe account to start receiving payments.
Money users pay you will go into your Stripe account, allowing you to transfer it out to your bank account.
